title: Personality Profiling: Ahri Mains
body:
“Wow I’m ahri, what did the fox say? Who cares, just watch me miss everything and still assassinate you. I’m so seductive teehee, *moans uncontrollably for no reason* xd” 

Ahri mains are the type of people to color coordinate all of their Ahri body pillows with their sheets, blankets, pillow cases and in extreme cases, the lightbulbs in their room. Make one of them mad? They’ll throw a lightbulb at you and yell “snarf ORB OF DECEPTION SNARF”
